definition: to kill to the last one (idiom)/to exterminate/to eradicate/ruthless
to overtake/to catch up with/to hurry/to rush/to try to catch (the bus etc)/to drive (cattle etc) forward/to drive (sb) away/to avail oneself of (an opportunity)/until
to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely
to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means

sentences.english: Another example would be the language used in Overkill.
sentences.chinese: 另一個例子可能會是《趕盡殺絕》中使用的語言。

sentences.english: In addition, many sea creatures are being wiped out by fishing boats.
sentences.chinese: 此外，捕撈船正在將大量的海洋生物趕盡殺絕。

sentences.english: As a result, he ended up dead, with his family endangered.
sentences.chinese: 結果，他死了，他的家人也幾乎被趕盡殺絕。

definition: to lose one's standing/to have one's reputation swept away/a complete defeat and fall from grace
to be drowned (figurative and literal)
to speak without thinking (idiom)/to blurt sth out
many men, a great force (idiom); many hands provide great strength/There is safety in numbers.
outward devotion but inner opposition (idiom); to pay lip service/to agree overtly, but oppose in secret
see 臨陣退縮|临阵退缩[lin2 zhen4 tui4 suo1]
ill-gotten wealth or gains
red in the face/extremely angry
authentic
to think for oneself and act accordingly (idiom); to act on one's own initiative
to damn/to curse/to revile
to speak forcefully and with justice (idiom); to argue with the courage of one's convictions
rude and unreasonable
to show off one's military strength (idiom); to strut around/to bluff/to bluster
to sleep peacefully (idiom)/(fig.) to rest easy/to be free of worries
to oppose each other with equal harshness (idiom); tit for tat/measure for measure
